file.title: Selected columns

p.text: The property selects table columns or displays which columns are selected. The output is given in the form of 0,2,3, i.e. selected columns are the first, third and forth columns (numbering begins from "0"; 0 - is the first column, 1 - is the second one, etc.).

p.textAll:
To select a block of cells this command should be combined with the command Selected rows:
Window1.Table1.Selected rows = "1,0" Window1.Table1.Selected columns = "1" This fragment of code selects the first and second cells of the second column.
